Public NotInheritable Class SymSgdClassificationTrainer Inherits TrainerEstimatorBase(Of BinaryPredictionTransformer(Of IPredictorWithFeatureWeights(Of Single)), IPredictorWithFeatureWeights(Of Single))

Docs.remarks: Stochastic gradient descent (SGD) is an interative algorithm that optimizes a differentiable objective function. SYMSGD parallelizes SGD using Sound Combiners.
